question: DANX -19 has been conducted under the aegis of which command of the Indian Armed Forces?
explanation: The 2nd edition of Defence of Andaman and Nicobar Islands Exercise (DANX-19) has been conducted under the aegis of Andaman & Nicobar Command (ANC) from 14th to 18th Oct 2019. The 5-day exercise is a large scale joint services exercise of the Indian Army, Navy, Air Force and Coast Guard. The purpose of the exercise was to practice the defence of the island chain and recapturing islands
